long_desc.thetext:
+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #631282 +++
SeaMonkey 2.1 Beta 3 builds will be created today and the milestone needs relnotes when it appears.
Jens, are you able to tackle this again for me?

(In reply to comment #0) > Jens, are you able to tackle this again for me?
Sure.
Just a fyi (not sure if you seen it): https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=636210#c26

(In reply to comment #2) > Just a fyi (not sure if you seen it): > https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=636210#c26
Yes, included. Please check:
RCS file: /www/seamonkeyproject-org/src/releases/seamonkey2.1b3/changes.en.html,v done Checking in changes.en.html; /www/seamonkeyproject-org/src/releases/seamonkey2.1b3/changes.en.html,v <-- changes.en.html initial revision: 1.1 done RCS file: /www/seamonkeyproject-org/src/releases/seamonkey2.1b3/index.en.html,v done Checking in index.en.html; /www/seamonkeyproject-org/src/releases/seamonkey2.1b3/index.en.html,v <-- index.en.html initial revision: 1.1 done RCS file: /www/seamonkeyproject-org/src/releases/seamonkey2.1b3/relnote.var,v done Checking in relnote.var; /www/seamonkeyproject-org/src/releases/seamonkey2.1b3/relnote.var,v <-- relnote.var initial revision: 1.1 done
Regarding platform changes: Our last beta contained everything up to/including FF4.0b11. The FF4.0b12 relnotes don't do not contain anything extra noteworthy and the FF4.0 relnotes do not explain what changes wrt. the last beta at all: http://www.mozilla.com/en-US/firefox/4.0b12/releasenotes/ http://www.mozilla.com/en-US/firefox/4.0/releasenotes/ Thus I' won't include any platform changes this time unless someone points out something particular.
If anything is wrong or missing, let me know.

removed Mac Silverlight known issue since bug 643799 has been fixed (requested by stefanh over IRC)
Checking in index.en.html; /www/seamonkeyproject-org/src/releases/seamonkey2.1b3/index.en.html,v <-- index.en.html new revision: 1.2; previous revision: 1.1 done
